name: icmc-emulator
description: An Emulator for the CPU developed at ICMC
author: Vinicius Giroto <viniciusgiroto@usp.br> (https://giroto.dev)

scripts.build: npm run copy-public && lightningcss --minify --bundle --targets '>= 0.25%' src/styles/main.css -o dist/styles/main.css && npm run build-js && npm run build-icons && npm run build-modules && npm run build-wasm
scripts.watch-build: npm run copy-public && ln -frs src/styles/main.css dist/styles/main.css
scripts.build-modules: for module in mif assembler icmc-cc icmc-emulator; do wasm-pack build --target web --reference-types --weak-refs --release --no-pack modules/$module; done;
scripts.update: git submodule update --init --recursive --remote; for module in mif assembler icmc-cc icmc-emulator; do cd ./modules/$module; cargo update; cd ../..; done
scripts.clean: rimraf dist; for module in mif assembler icmc-cc icmc-emulator; do cd ./modules/$module; cargo clean; cd ../..; done
